name: Summarising the main findings of a Global Survey to Advance Ocean Observations
description: This is a summary of a global survey conducted to gather the perspectives of diverse stakeholders on the current state of ocean observations worldwide. The survey formed part of the BioEcoOcean project: Co-Creating Transformative Pathways to Biological and Ecosystem Ocean Observations, funded by Horizon Europe (Grant Agreement Number: 101136748). The survey represented the initial, foundational step towards identifying the gaps, challenges, and opportunities that the Blueprint needs to address.

keywords.name: Findable Accessible Interoperable and Reusable (FAIR) data
